name: Pixquotes
tagline: The all "new" way to generate text using markov chains.
body:
### Hello and welcome to this insanity

I know you love Markov chains, even if you don't know what they are. Perhaps you just really like silly text. Don't worry so does Lulu and she will be happy to make it for you with the help of her pixie.



(note any references to any characters real or fictional are purely coincidental)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
